overview: When love ends wrong, various reasons become justifications.  Love instantly becomes a wound that often brings sorrow, love, which was originally a verb, becomes a sign of danger. Give birth to many questions that make each perpetrator further away from the word happy.  When love goes wrong and problems get tangled up hard to unravel, what's better than the word 'Done'?
tagline: When love goes wrong, is there another word for it than 'done'?
title: Selesai
